history.proof: intros n m. induction n. - simpl. sfirstorder depth: 3. - hauto use: technical_lemma, tech_add_pos_posZ, tech_opp_pos_negZ, multZ_eq5.

original: intros n m. induction n. - simpl. rewrite Nat.mul_add_distr_r. rewrite Nat.add_succ_r. simpl. rewrite Nat.mul_succ_l. rewrite Nat.mul_succ_r. simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite <- IHn. rewrite tech_mult_negO. rewrite tech_add_neg_posZ. rewrite multZ_eq5. rewrite multZ_eq4. rewrite Nat.add_shuffle3. rewrite tech_add_neg_negZ. reflexivity.
